flavorText: Sunhome—the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

foreignData.flavorText: Sonnenheim — das robuste Schutzschild, der hoch aufragende Wachposten, der Sitz der Gerechtigkeit.
foreignData.name: Sonnenheim, Festung der Legion
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält bis zum Ende des Zuges Doppelschlag.

foreignData.flavorText: Casa Solar. El escudo inquebrantable, el centinela imponente, el trono de la justicia.
foreignData.name: Casa Solar, base de la Legión
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de dañar dos veces hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Solcastel — le bouclier invincible, la sentinelle dominante, le siège de la justice.
foreignData.name: Solcastel, forteresse de la Légion
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{2}{R}{W}, {T} : La créature ciblée acquiert la double initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Sol-Dimora. Lo scudo vigoroso, la sentinella torreggiante, la sede della giustizia.
foreignData.name: Sol-Dimora, Rocca della Legione
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: La creatura bersaglio guadagna doppio attacco fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: サンホーム――頑強な盾であり、そびえ立つ歩哨であり、正義の座。
foreignData.name: 軍の要塞、サンホーム
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{2}{R}{W}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで二段攻撃を得る。

foreignData.flavorText: Morada do Sol o vigoroso escudo, o sentinela mais elevado, a moradia da justiça.
foreignData.name: Morada do Sol, Fortaleza da Legião
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adiciona {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: A criatura alvo ganha golpe duplo até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Дом Солнца — надежный щит, возвышающийся страж, престол справедливости.
foreignData.name: Дом Солнца, крепость Легиона
foreignData.text:
{T}: Добавьте {1} в запас маны.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Целевое существо получает двойной удар до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 阳园～威武的坚盾，耸立的守卫，正义的王座。
foreignData.name: 教团要塞阳园
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{2}{R}{W}，{T}：目标生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

name: Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion
originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: If you give double strike to a creature with first strike after first-strike combat damage has been dealt, that creature will also deal damage during the normal combat damage step.
If you give double strike to a creature after either first-strike or normal combat damage has been dealt, it won’t help that creature deal any additional combat damage.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
